snippet: The academic performance of student-athletes will be a factor in how coaches and athletic directors at University of California campuses are evaluated and compensated under a new policy approved by the university system’s president, Janet...
abstract: Evaluations and pay of University of California coaches and athletic directors are now tied to academic performance of its student-athletes.
lead_paragraph: The academic performance of student-athletes will be a factor in how coaches and athletic directors at University of California campuses are evaluated and compensated under a new policy approved by the university system’s president, Janet Napolitano.
